name: mystylepages
overview:
Mystylepages.com is an all-encompassing source for Salons, Spas, and Stylists.

Offering the most comprehensive Salon Listings and Stylist Network, Finding a salon/stylist that is tailored to your needs is simple by the super easy navigational tools on MSP. One can search by neighborhood, treatment, narrow down further by special features ( open late, celeb stylist,etc), view price menus and ultimately book an appointment request or save it in your favorites!

In addition, MSP offers a paid subscription-based social platform for Stylists to gain exposure & new clients by listing with Salons. We believe traffic from this needed service will drive clients to them. Stylists are able to manage their bookings and offer promotional coupons on their end as well.

Msp allows one to subscribe to a coupon newsletter, with a loyalty program being rolled out soon.

external_links.title: Finding the Best New York Salons and Spas Just Got Easier at the New MyStylePages.com
